title: Deceased address
question: What was {deceasedName}'s permanent address at the time of their death?
explanation1: If they were living in a care home, you should enter that address.

addressLine1.required: Enter the first line of the address
addressLine1.invalid: Enter an address line that is 2-150 characters long

postTown.invalid: Enter a post town that is 2-50 characters long

newPostCode.invalid: Enter a postcode that is 2-14 characters long
